title: Knockbacks should be able to send champions through Bard's Magical Journey
body: the wombo combos and the plays could be just hilarious if this was allowed

replies.body: This sounds really cool. I'll run this by Rabid Llama and see what he thinks. There may be a really good reason it shouldn't be done, though.

I recall asking him about something like this on the PBE shortly before Bard was released, though I think it was with Magical Journey sucking in people who get Q'd to it. It certainly sounds fun, but it also sounds kinda OP. Going through a Magical Journey effectively stuns for a couple of seconds, and can deposit someone so far away that they just can't rejoin the fight. It would be cool, but as a Bard main, I'd sort of rather not have that much of my power budget eaten up by something so unreliable.

Note also that Magical Journey has really long range right now (as in, the distance from Bard to the wall where the portal appears). This might let this trick work with less risk to Bard than is necessarily desirable.
